resources.string: 該網站的憑證不可信任，要繼續前往嗎?
清除瀏覽器資料或是當離開程式時決定要清除什麼資料
決定當啟動時哪些元件被開啟
設定你想要使用的搜尋服務
如果開啟，網頁內容會以相反的顏色呈現，有點類似 Dark Mode
Enable remote content, which is not directly from the website you are visiting. Disabling this is more secure, faster and saves data volume. But some content will not be displayed anymore.
告訴網站你傾向於儲存資料。下次可能會載入得比較快
支援下載網路圖片。如果關閉，可以節省網路流量，網頁載入也會比較快
If enabled, all cookies will be deleted. Also the Cookies of trusted websites.

Enable Cookies. Cookies are small text files, which are stored on your device. Websites use them for example to store user settings (for example search settings). But they could also be used to collect personal user data. Third party cookies (they collect user data for advertising) are always disabled.
If you disable Cookies, you can use this whitelist to allow sites you trust to use save cookies.
啟用 JavaScript. 許多網站需要 JavaScript 來達成一些功能(menus, loading and displaying images, …). 但啟用 Javascript 可能會有一些潛在性的風險
If you disable JavaScript, you can use this whitelist to allow sites you trust to use javascript.
Enable AdBlock to block annoying ads. Sites also load faster when enabled.
Allow these sites to show ads. Some sites do not work, when AdBlock is enabled.
Allow websites to access your location. Some websites (like Google maps for navigation) need this enabled.
儲存瀏覽過的網頁記錄

All files will be exported to the \"Android/data/de.baumann.browser/files/browser_backup/\" directory of your sd-card. This directory will be DELETED, if you uninstall \"EinkBro Browser\". So make a backup regularly on a save place.
Every time you quit \"EinkBro Browser\" all above checked data will be deleted.
刪除整個資料庫(Startpage, bookmarks, history and all whitelists).
改為操作行為或介面，讓它更符合你的使用習慣
Import and export several app data (whitelists, bookmarks).
To show the filter dialog long press on the bookmark icon in the overview. Decide which filters you will use.
設定首頁要開啟的網頁。輸入 \"about:blank\" 會開啟空白頁
自訂 custom search URL. 請選擇 \"Custom search engine\" 當為搜尋方式
Here you can enter a custom user agent. Let empty to use default one.
Use the whole screen when scrolling through websites. If you press the back button you will leave fullscreen mode.
Pressing back will make the toolbar visible, before going back in history.
設定浮動按鍵出現的位置
點擊分頁數字時，預設開啟的畫面
關閉分頁前，顯示對話框
每次啟動 App 時都顯示畫面預覽
In expanded overview the tab preview will hide. Then you have more place for your bookmarks.
在工具列或浮動按鈕上使用手勢
重新開啟最後一個分頁
Reopen a new tab when the last tab is closed instead of exiting the browser.
Export app data (Startpage + previews, History, Bookmarks) and your personal settings.
This will delete all your current settings and data. Will you proceed?
Open the system app settings for \"EinkBro Browser\". There you can, depending on your Android version grant permissions, clear the app data and so on.
Successfully opened in a new tab
Do you really want to delete the entry?
Entry already exists. Please enter new title.
Do you really want to clear?
\"EinkBro Browser\" needs the permission to \"read and write on your storage\". This is needed to download files, taking screenshots and making backups of your data.
\"EinkBro Browser\" needs the permission to \"access your location\". This is requested from some websites for example when they offer some kind of navigation.
You must restart \"EinkBro Browser\" to apply changes. Close now?
Do you want to quit \"EinkBro Browser\"?
Do you want to close current tab?
This website uses an unsecured connection (\"http\"). Do you want to try a secure connection (\"https\")?
Backup data? This will overwrite the old backup.

Menus and dialogs
All menus and dialogs are opened at the bottom of the screen. If the dialog is large you will first see only the upper part. If you swipe it up, the rest will get visible.
You can close them by pressing the back button, swiping them down or by clicking outside

Long press
If you long press the menu icon or the \"Navigation button\", the \"Fast toggle dialog\" will show. If you long press the \"Bookmark icon\", the \"Filter dialog\" will show.

There are two parts in the \"Overview\" (tab preview and personal data). There is an extra menu. In the settings you can change the behavior of the \"Overview\".

Tab preview
It is the upper part of the \"Overview\". To change tabs just click the preview. To close a tab long press the preview. If you swipe the tab preview up, your personal content will open.

Personal content
There are three parts: the Startsite, your Bookmarks and your History. If you long click an entry a menu with more options will appear.

You can tag your bookmarks with filters. In this way you can group your bookmarks. You can open the filter dialog by long pressing the bookmark icon. If you activate an entry a dialog will appear, where you can edit the name of the filter.

Your language isn\'t supported yet? You want to translate EinkBro Browser? Or make improvements to existing translations? Feel free to join us on Crowdin: https://crowdin.com/project/foss-browser.

On the following sites you have access to all important information about \"EinkBro Browser\". Please read also the help dialog within the app.

First I would like to thank all people who contributed in any way on this project. They submitted issues, translated or helped in any other way. On following sites you can become a active member of this great community:

Crowdin:
Crowdin is an online plattform to translate applications in other languages. A big thanks to all translators. You can also help.
https://crowdin.com/project/foss-browser

XDA-thread:
XDA is a great community for developers and smartphone enthusiasts. Here you can report issues, ask for new features and everything other related to \"EinkBro Browser\".
https://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/app-browser-t3500091

Github:
On Github you can see the source code of \"EinkBro Browser\". This is the more technical solution: open issues, ask for new features or even help developing or translating.
https://github.com/scoute-dich/browser


Following people contributed at this project. If I have forgotten anybody, please contact me:
加粗字體，提高可讀性(需要重新載入網頁)
翻頁時保留的畫面長度
翻頁時，可保留部分畫面內容，請設定要保留的長度。如不需要可以設為 0
設定點擊畫面何處會翻頁
將網頁輸出成 pdf 時，預設紙張大小
將字型設為 Noto Sans Serif
